infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Fish Log needs access to your camera to take photos of your catch for harvest reports and the rewards raffle.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Fish Log needs access to your photo library to select photos of your catch for harvest reports and your profile picture.

plugins.cameraPermission: Fish Log needs access to your camera to take photos of your catch for harvest reports and the rewards raffle.
plugins.photosPermission: Fish Log needs access to your photo library to select photos of your catch for harvest reports and your profile picture.
